item.description:
At the outset, the ensemble will briefly review its Self-Diagnosis from its last performance. In particular will be a discussion of sticking points that have recurred from past shows.

Afterward, the Ensemble will move into a repertoire of warm ups and drills that work to hone fundamental and advanced skills. This rehearsal will also serve as an opportunity to learn and practice a new set of games. Based on the outcome of this rehearsal, a new lineup will be devised for the Ensemble's upcoming show at Somerville Home.

Members who did not perform in a particular previous show are asked to review the show notes that correspond to this performance.

Please communicate with Jason for more details about this rehearsal and to confirm your attendance.

Best regards,
Harish

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle

item.name: Ensemble A Rehearsal
